loginSuccessful.title: Login Successful!
loginSuccessful.loginSuccessSubheading: You are all set to use Dat-Empower!

errors.authBugLogoutAndLoginAgain: It looks like there might be a small glitch. Please give it another try, and if you continue to encounter this issue, logging out and then back in can often help. Thank you for your understanding!.
errors.anotherTokenIssued: Another device has logged in with this account. Please login again.
errors.tokenExpired: Seems like your session has expired. Please login again.
errors.couldNotRefreshToken: Seems like your session has expired. Please login again.
errors.oneTimeTokenExpired: This attempt has expired. Please try again.
